verbs.description: [ARG0: indonesians] [V: swap] [ARG1: bottles] [ARG3: for bus tickets] [ARGM-LOC: under the scheme launched by surabaya in april] commuters can ride red city buses by dropping off plastic bottles at terminals or directly paying a fare with bottles surabaya is the first city in indonesia to implement this scheme garbage like plastic bottles piles up in my neighbourhood so i brought it here so the environment is not only cleaner but also to surabaya reuters bottles indonesia
